meanings.definition: A highly toxic protein found in the seeds of the rosary pea.
meanings.sent1: The abrin in the rosary pea seeds can be very dangerous.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the effects of abrin on the human body.
meanings.sent3: The abrin in the seeds is like a tiny but powerful villain.
meanings.sent4: The abrin's potency is as strong as a raging storm.
meanings.sent5: The presence of abrin in the seeds is a silent threat waiting to harm.

meanings.definition: Toxin derived from the seeds of the rosary pea plant.
meanings.sent1: Avoid ingesting any abrin from the rosary pea plant.
meanings.sent2: The toxin abrin can cause severe health issues if consumed.
meanings.sent3: The abrin toxin is like a sneaky troublemaker in the plant.
meanings.sent4: The effects of abrin are as damaging as a hidden trap.
meanings.sent5: The presence of abrin in the plant serves as a warning to all who encounter it.
